content:
In a day of celebration camaraderie and remembrance the  Campus Muster Ceremony will take place Thursday in Reed Arena at  p.m PERIOD

Aggie Muster is a yearly tradition that calls Aggies around the world to gather together share memories from their time on campus and to remember comrades who died in the past year. about  Aggies and visitors are expected to gather in Reed Arena Thursday evening in a candlelit ceremony to remember current and former students who have died since April   PERIOD

A flagraising ceremony at  a.m PERIOD will kick off campus Musters activities PERIOD The Aggie Class of  is invited back to Texas AM as the 50year Muster reunion class and current students are invited to share good bull stories about campus events with reunion class members at the Camaraderie Barbeque at Kyle Fields Northeast Plaza from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD

The Campus Muster ceremony begins at  p.m PERIOD in Reed Arena PERIOD R.C PERIOD Slocum Texas AMs winningest football coach and the coach during the  Aggie Bonfire collapse will deliver a keynote address before the Roll Call for the Absent PERIOD During Roll Call the names of Aggies with ties to campus who have died since the  Muster  including current students and deceased members of the  year reunion class  are read PERIOD

 names are listed on the Roll Call at time of press PERIOD Any Aggie or visitor who knew the person called who shares their class year or who feels inclined may answer here when the name is read aloud to symbolize the Aggies presence remains as part of the Aggie family PERIOD Musters held worldwide conduct similar ceremonies to honor deceased Aggies in their communities PERIOD

The Muster Reflections Display will be open to visitors in the MSC Flag Room to serve as a living memorial to those Aggies listed on the Roll Call PERIOD About  Aggies have displays set up by their families and loved ones that feature photographs and personal items to convey to viewers an idea of who they were as individuals PERIOD

Josiah Bezet Muster Committee chair said the Roll Call allows Aggies to honor celebrate and reflect on the lives of the absent PERIOD

Ive known some people personally on the Roll Call every year Bezet said PERIOD Theyre unable to answer here for themselves and whether it was a diehard Aggie or someone who barely bought into the traditions at AM Muster is the equalizer of all that PERIOD They give the exact same respect and honor to every Aggie regardless of background or heritage or what they did while they were on campus PERIOD It gives respect to every single person in the exact same light. marikit Tomlinson Muster awareness subchair said April  acts as a unifier for Aggies and a time to stand together in support as a family PERIOD

A man from the reunion class excitedly grabbed me and took me over to a display Tomlinson said describing a memory about Muster PERIOD The reunion member asked me to read the date on the cover of an AM versus Bama Cotton Bowl game PERIOD It was  PERIOD In response he said I knew it PERIOD I remember that game PERIOD Me and another Aggie listened to the whole thing over the radio in a foxhole in Vietnam. it is just crazy how Muster can bring back a surge of memories that can be shared across our Aggie family regardless of generation. log In
